entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 12:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait this evening and after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023
